nutritionists.name: Dr. Sarah Hallberg, MD, MS, FACP
nutritionists.description: I help people with diabetes and obesity to improve their health and quality of life. I offer online coaching and group programs.

nutritionists.name: Susan Levin, MS, RD, CSSD
nutritionists.description: I'm a registered dietitian and nutritionist specializing in plant-based diets, sports nutrition, weight loss, and chronic disease prevention.

nutritionists.name: Jason Brown, MS, RDN
nutritionists.description: I'm a nutritionist and wellness coach with a passion for helping people develop healthy habits and achieve their goals. I offer virtual consultations and personalized nutrition plans.

nutritionists.name: Dr. Rachel Carmody, PhD
nutritionists.description: I'm a nutrition scientist and educator with a focus on public health and environmental sustainability. I teach courses on food systems and nutrition policy at the university level.

nutritionists.name: Michael Davidson, MS, RDN, CDCES
nutritionists.description: I'm a clinical nutritionist and certified diabetes care and education specialist (CDCES) with experience in hospital, outpatient, and corporate wellness settings. I provide evidence-based nutrition counseling and education for individuals.
